short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A mod manager for Free Rider HD.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This mod manager allows the user to inject userscripts written by third party developers into Free Rider HD. It was created to give priority to some scripts over others to prevent overlapping features. The aim of this app is to improve third party mod accessibility for users, as well as improve the developing experience of mods for third party developers.

â€¢ Developers will not have to account for navigation/location change events, this mod manager will automatically re-run all scripts whenever the location changes.
